svg.text: Serverless execution • Google Cloud infrastructure • Built-in Google Workspace integration
Automatic scaling • Security sandbox • OAuth 2.0 authentication
6-minute execution limit • Daily quotas • Trigger management
Smart Contract: NoTamperData_registry • Metadata Label: 8434 • UTxO Model
Blockfrost API • Network validation • Immutable storage
Transaction fees: ~2.175 ADA per hash • Verification: Free queries
Component Communication: Trigger Events → Data Processing → Hash Generation → API Transmission → Blockchain Storage → Verification
